tool_description: Connects to social media platforms and retrieves posts, comments, and user data based on specified search criteria and time ranges.

platform.description: Social media platform name (twitter, facebook, instagram, linkedin, tiktok, youtube)

search_query.description: Search query string for finding relevant content

start_time.description: Start time for data collection in ISO 8601 format

end_time.description: End time for data collection in ISO 8601 format

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to retrieve (1-10000)

include_replies.description: Whether to include reply posts in results

error_messages: Invalid platform: Platform must be one of [twitter, facebook, instagram, linkedin, tiktok, youtube]
Authentication failed: Invalid or expired credentials for the specified platform
Rate limit exceeded: Too many requests made to the platform API, wait before retrying
Invalid time range: start_time must be earlier than end_time and both must be valid ISO 8601 timestamps
Query too broad: Search query returned too many results, please narrow your search criteria
Max results out of range: max_results must be between 1 and 10000
usage: Provide platform name, search query, and time range. Optionally set max_results and include_replies. The tool returns collected social media posts with metadata.

timestamps.description: Array of post timestamps in ISO 8601 format
